yaml.title: Blog
yaml.description:
Welcome to my blog. Posts here should not be mistaken with journal grade publications. What I write here is mostly what I learn myself and can therefore contain mistakes. Some blog posts are also just there so that I can structure my thoughts a bit. I publish these posts as a way to motivate myself to keep learning and as a way for others to learn alongside me. If you find any mistakes or have feedback, please leave a comment or get in contact with me.

I am still working on this part of the website. Please come back later to see what I am thinking about.
